sense.gloss: drop-by-drop, dripping, dribbling, in a trickle
incessantly (esp. speaking, e.g. complaints, compliments), in great profusion

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑時間↑↓じかん↓がないといつも↑不平↑↓ふへい↓|たらたら|だ。
sdata.e: She keeps moaning that she has no time.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑時間↑↓じかん↓がないといつも↑不平↑↓ふへい↓|たらたら|だ。
sdata.e: She keeps complaining that she has no time.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑時間↑↓じかん↓がないといつも↑不平↑↓ふへい↓|たらたら|だ。
sdata.e: She keeps complaining that she doesn't have time.
